name: Pizza Tower Demo
description:
Pizza Tower is a Wario Land inspired platformer currently in development.

Here is a few things to know before playing this:
-This is the a demo/prototype for the first level
-Almost all sound effects are either missing or placeholder
-There are probably a lot of bugs that I'm unaware of

If you happen to find some game breaking stuff or want to contact me for some reason, you can find me on Discord (Linked on my Twitter page), pizzatowergame@gmail.com, directly on Twitter Etc.
 

Credits:

Game and art: 
Pizza Tower Guy

Music: 
Mr.Sauceman
Dim Widdy
Frostix
Post Elvis
